full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
ACAN PowerMaster 3302 Device (UT280-23-2713)

## Reference Number
WS3763159090-Doc3765999857

## Publication Date
28 November 2022

## Tender Closing Date
13 December 2022 (2:00p EST)

## Procurement Information
* **Procurement Method:** **Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)**
* **Procurement Category:** Government Department (GD)
* **Trade Agreements:** None
* **Regions:** Ontario (except NCR)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Tender Details
Measurement Canada (MC) is announcing a tender for the supply and delivery of a **Electrical Measuring and Testing Equipment** (UNSPSC: 41113600). 

**Tender Description:**
This notice is inviting suppliers to express their interest in delivering a PowerMaster 3302 device, meeting CAT IV 600V and IEC 61010 safety standards. The device is to be delivered on or before February 23, 2023.

**Statement of Capabilities:**
A statement of capabilities is required from interested suppliers. The closing date for submitting a statement of capabilities is 13 December 2022 (2:00p EST). 

**Attachment:**
Please refer to the non-parse URL: `http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14739392` for more information.

**Contact Information:**
For more information about this announcement, please contact:
Cheng, Sabrina (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: N/A
Fax: N/A

## Notice URL
A link to the complete notice URL can be found at: `http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14739392`. 

# End of Announcement. 

Note: 
The original document from the contractor had many extra details that I chose not to include in my rewritten document, such as the `contactInfo*` fields, which seemed more like a contact log that can be replaced or inferred using email.  Let me know if you need me to add these fields back.

Let me know if this meets your requirements or if there are other things you would like me to add.  I know the document originally has a very similar structure for both
